resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

rtpsw commented on pull request #12412:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12412#issuecomment-1045026901


   Hmm, for some reason the test failed (only) on AMD64 Windows MingGW 64:
   ```
   [ RUN      ] TestUnaryArithmeticFloating/1.Sqrt
   D:/a/arrow/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/testing/gtest_util.cc:176: Failure
   Failed
   Expected:
   1.3407807929942596e+154
   Actual:
   1.3407807929942597e+154
   D:/a/arrow/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/testing/gtest_util.cc:176: Failure
   Failed
   Expected:
   1.3407807929942596e+154
   Actual:
   1.3407807929942597e+154
   [  FAILED  ] TestUnaryArithmeticFloating/1.Sqrt, where TypeParam = arrow::DoubleType (0 ms)
   ```


--

lidavidm edited a comment on pull request #12412:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12412#issuecomment-1045038511


   We can set `this->equal_options_.atol(<floating-point delta>)`
   
   TestUnaryArithmeticFloating inherits from TestUnaryArithmetic which inherits from TestBaseUnaryArithmetic which contains a `EqualOptions equal_options_` that controls the approximate comparisons (and AssertUnaryOp boils down to AssertScalarsApproxEqual/AssertArraysApproxEqual)


--

rtpsw commented on pull request #12412:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12412#issuecomment-1045175684


   > Thanks for doing this! @rtpsw could you please add entries for `sqrt` and `sqrt_checked` in the table of **Arithmetic functions** in [compute.rst](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/cpp/compute.rst)?
   
   Will do.
   
   @lidavidm: As for the tests, now they succeed on "AMD64 Windows MinGW 64" but fail on "AMD64 Windows MinGW 32". This is weird, given that I added a tolerance. How would you suggest resolving this? It's not going to be convenient for me to set up the kind of system on which the tests fail.


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: The list of execution engine's binary scalar kernels currently available in `cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_arithmetic.cc` does not cover the common sqrt function (Split from ARROW-15571).
